Project Description:

Enterprise application for Listed Derivatives Client Clearing. Development and support of the applications for the investment bank  The project is responsible for development and supports ~15 applications. Main idea of application is to provide for clients an interactive self service solution to see their real time status of top day trades, perform allocations and to perform position management. This helps in reducing the effort on corresponding region's operational load in order to perform trade and position management.

 

Responsibilities:

Primary:


  • Setting up new functionality with scheduled job's framework
  • Communication with Customer
Secondary:
  • Manage and resolve Production Incidents, Service Requests, Request for Change, Requests for Information
  • Evironment configuration and releases performing under development team instructions
  • Client onboarding
  • Root cause analysis and remediation steps planning
  • Communication with SL2 team, provision of runbook updates 

Skills Required:


  • Knowledge of scripting, bash/shell/perl - to use on remote consoles unix/solaris-based
  • SQL knowledge  Experience in some development language (java/.Net is preferrable)
  • Good verbal and written English
  • Possibility:
    • to analyze the issues quickly, under a time pressure mode
    • to learn finance domain areas
    • to investigate new applications and system of Global Investment Bank and 3rd party systems.
 

Work conditions:

  • Salary rates will depend on the interview results+ social package (medical insurance, education, etc.)
  • We provide relocation package to St.Petersburg residents
